trends: There have been no other sightings in Salaberry-de-Valleyfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: two amber colored lights,fairly low alltitude,as they were beneath the dark clouds at dusk.seemed to be one object and moving at a considerable rate of speed
divs: Sighting Detailsi was pulling out of my driveway,heading towards the grocery store.im always looking towards the sky and have spotted objects that i could not identify on a few occasions.it was a rather overcast night(near dusk)and the clouds were quite low.as i was driving i noticed two bright amber colored lights moving from west to east,i observed this or these objects from my car for approx 1 minute,what caught my attention was the lack of runner lights.i pulled over in front of our corner bank and got out of my car.the object move across the the sky at a good rate(hard to estimate,but not a ballon,at least several hundred miles an hour)and disappeared into the horizon.im not sure,but the lights seemed to be one craft.this is my first time reporting any sighting,but i have witnessed several of these objects since febuary 08,and also,objects that seem to mimic stars,but then fade in and out,not due to cloud cover.i own my own company and i work outdoors in the middle of the night.i have noticed a dramatic increase lately,and i would like to hear from anyone in this area who has experienced the same.thank you john s
